hof.core.utils

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • hof.core.utils.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class where all important Settings are stored and can be loaded from here.
    The Settings are saved in Preferences and can be modified through the Settings-Dialog.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void load()
      All settings are loaded from the Preferences, if there is no Preference file to be found the default vlaue is used.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static void load()
        All settings are loaded from the Preferences, if there is no Preference file to be found the default vlaue is used.

      • savePrefs

        public static void savePrefs()
        Saves the current value into the Preferences file. This will be called by the Settings-Dialog upon saving.
